channel.title: SHops
channel.description:
K got this problem,
i know how to edit the shops and wich files i use, but i can open autospawn.cfg and either shops.cfg.
so i kopied both, maked of the copy a .java so i could edit, later i compiled and it didnt works-.-
so how can i make from a .java to a .cfg rename dont work. or other better answer how can i open a cfg
thanks joey

You open it with notepad, or wordpad and edit the .cfg files
